title.narrative: Communauté électrique du Bénin’s (CEB) Electric Energy Production Dispatching and Transport Project
Dispatching de production et de transport d'énergie électrique de la Communauté électrique du Bénin

description.narrative: The objectives of the project is to install an electric disparching centre in CEB in order to improve the efficiency of its operation

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Energy - power generation
